detail_desc: Set with a long-sleeved top, pair of leggings and a hairband in soft jersey. A-line top with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and open pockets at the hem. Leggings with an elasticated waist. Hairband with a sewn-on bow at the front.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Short, sleeveless dress in lace with a round neckline, concealed zip at the back, seam at the waist and scalloped hem. Jersey lining.
Calf-length, flared skirt in woven fabric with buttons at the top, concealed pockets in the side seams and an opening at the hem.
Fitted dress in soft, ribbed jersey with gathers at the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Leather belt with a metal buckle. Width 2.7 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Lined hood with a wrapover front that has decorative eyelets, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Baby Exclusive. Textured top in soft organic cotton jersey with a round neck, press-stud on one shoulder and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Twisted seams at the front and short slits in the sides.
Hat in a soft rib-knit cotton blend. Turn-up at the hem with a small appliqué.
Waist bag with a zip at the top and an adjustable strap with a plastic fastener. Lined. Size 5x12x24 cm.
Jacket in soft faux fur with no fasteners. Unlined sleeves and a jersey lining front and back.
Swim shorts in recycled polyester with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Short lace dress with a round neckline, concealed zip at the back, short cap sleeves and a seam at the waist. Jersey lining.
Jacket in an airy, patterned weave with dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves and a narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist. The polyester content of the jacket is partly recycled.

Maxi dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a sewn-in wrapover at the front. Low-cut back with a concealed zip, a seam at the waist and an airy skirt with a slit at the front. Unlined.
Wide T-shirt in cotton jersey with gently dropped shoulders and a chest pocket.
Joggers in an airy viscose weave with an elasticated waist with a tasselled drawstring, side pockets and tapered legs with covered elastic at the hems.
Long jumper in a soft, fine knit with decorative beads at the top. Small stand-up collar, gently dropped shoulders and wide sleeves with narrow ribbing at the cuffs.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in soft, stretch denim with hard-worn details. Adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, and narrow hems. Jersey lining.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide, foldover waist panel for best fit over the tummy.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a wide hem.
Fitted jacket in washed, stretch denim with buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button, and side pockets.
Longjohns in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
T-shirt in heavy cotton jersey with a print motif on the front. Relaxed fit with a round neck and dropped shoulders.

Knee-length, padded coat in woven fabric with a lined hood with an elasticated drawstring, and a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Fleece-lined handwarmer pockets, one inner pocket and large, fleece-lined patch front pockets with a flap and concealed press-studs. Ribbed cuffs and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Lined. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.
Trousers in a soft, patterned viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and elasticated hems.
Sleeveless dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and small stand-up collar. Gathers at the shoulders and a seam with ties at the waist. Lined.
Bermuda shorts in imitation leather with a high waist, pleats at the front, zip fly, diagonal side pockets and a fake back pocket.
Fully lined, backless swimsuit with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a twisted detail at the front and a fastener at the back. Cut-out section at the waist.
Metal watch with a narrow adjustable strap with a metal buckle. Width of strap 1.5 cm, total length 22 cm. Diameter of watch 3.5 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft fabric with a print motif, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Scarf in a patterned weave.

Push-up bra in lace and microfibre with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton and cashmere blend with a ribbed neckline and long sleeves.
Top in a crinkled, printed viscose weave with a V-neck, lacing at the front and narrow adjustable shoulder straps.
Leather sandals with square toes, a decorative metal ring on the front and an adjustable ankle strap. Leather insoles. Heel 5 cm.
Jumper in a soft, rib knit with a stand-up collar, a visible zip at the front and long sleeves.
Hipster briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Soft cap in UV-protective fabric with a peak at the front and flap at the back to protect both the face and back of the neck. UPF 50.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a double-layered trim at the top, long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved bodysuit in soft cotton jersey with a collar, button placket, decorative chest pocket and press-studs at the crotch.
Short dress in a patterned weave with short, wide sleeves and a wrapover front with concealed press-studs and ties at one side. Unlined.
Short, fitted dress in organic cotton jersey with a round neck, short sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy. Unlined.
Boxer briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Quilted, gently fitted, lightweight coat with a small stand-up collar, press-studs down the front and flap front pockets with a press-stud. Filling 90% down and 10% feathers.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Top in an airy, patterned Tencel™ lyocell and silk weave with an opening with a covered button at the top and gathered seam at the front. V-neck at the back, dropped shoulders and short puff sleeves with pleats and elasticated sleeve-ends.
Ankle-length, circular skirt in woven fabric with a high waist that has a zip and button at one side.
Flared leggings in ribbed cotton jersey with a regular, elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed slub cotton jersey.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and one back pocket. Brushed inside.

Long-sleeved blouse in airy, crinkled chiffon with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck and seams with short frill trims at the front and around the armholes. Gently dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill at the cuffs, and a straight-cut hem. Unlined.
Padded all-in-one suit in narrow-wale organic cotton corduroy with a padded hood. Buttons at the top, concealed press-studs at the sides and long raglan sleeves. Organic cotton jersey lining.
Top in softly draping silk with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved blouse in airy viscose jersey with a tie detail at the front, an opening with a button at the back of the neck, and wide sleeves.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in a soft organic cotton textured knit with buttons down the front.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton and recycled polyester blend with a soft brushed inside. Covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in a cotton weave with wide elastication at the back. Opening with a wide tie at the top, buttons down the front and long cuffed sleeves.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Fabric hairband with a knot detail at the front and covered elastic at the back.
Beret in cotton corduroy with decorative ties at the back. Lined.
EMMA JAYNE x H&M. Classic T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a motif. Raw edges around the neckline and sleeves.
Sleeveless blouse in a soft cotton weave with a stand-up collar with a pleated edge. Pin tucks and pearly buttons at the top and a narrow, adjustable tie belt at the waist.
Fitted strappy top in soft cotton jersey with a lace-trimmed V-neck.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs down one side and at the crotch.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist and ventilating mesh sections on the legs.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a motif on the front.
Long, fitted jersey top with narrow adjustable shoulder straps.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline. Press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).

Straight-cut shirt jacket in sturdy twill made from a wool blend. Turn-down collar, a classic front and long sleeves with a sleeve placket and buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, and a rounded hem.

Set with a hooded top and joggers in sweatshirt fabric and a jersey T-shirt. Top with a jersey-lined hood, print motif and zip down the front. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist, print motif on the front, side pockets, back pocket and wide, ribbed hems. Round-neck T-shirt with a print motif on the front.
Straight-style top in an airy rib knit with a round neckline, dropped shoulders, short sleeves and high slits in the sides.
Short dress in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck, dropped shoulders and short sleeves. Smocked seam at the waist and a rounded hem.
Cardigan in a soft bouclé knit made from a wool blend with a hood and no buttons.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 80x200 cm.
Trainers in imitation leather with mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Boxy-style top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Narrow, ribbed trim around the neckline, dropped shoulders and short sleeves with sewn in turn-ups.
Short shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, and side pockets.
